description: Upgrade your trading automation with professional MT4 to MT5 migration services in Spintex, the vital commercial corridor connecting Accra to Tema. Serving the diverse trading community along the Spintex road—from small business owners to professional traders—we provide reliable MT4 to MT5 EA conversion that delivers real results. Understanding that Spintex traders value practical solutions and proven performance, our MT4 to MT5 upgrade service focuses on delivering measurable improvements in your trading automation. We leverage MT5's key advantages including faster execution speeds for better trade fills, real tick backtesting providing accurate strategy validation, comprehensive multi-asset trading support, and improved order management that reduces errors and improves efficiency. Conveniently located along the Spintex corridor with easy access from both Accra and Tema, we make EA migration accessible and hassle-free. Our migration process follows proven best practices including clean MQL5 code architecture, comprehensive error handling, flexible account configuration, and thorough testing to ensure 98%+ signal accuracy. We understand Spintex traders need trading systems that work reliably day after day—no surprises, just consistent performance.

h2Headings: MT4 to MT5 Migration on Spintex Corridor
Why Upgrade Your EA to MT5 Platform
Get Started with EA Migration in Spintex

faq.question: How much does MT4 to MT5 migration cost?
faq.answer: Transparent pricing starts at $250 for straightforward EAs. Complex multi-strategy systems with advanced features range $500-$1000. We provide a free EA analysis and honest quote with no hidden costs. Payment plans available for Spintex business clients.

faq.question: Will the migrated EA really perform better on MT5?
faq.answer: Yes! MT5 typically executes trades 30-50% faster than MT4, provides more accurate backtesting with real ticks, and offers better order management. These improvements translate to better fills, reduced slippage, and more reliable automated trading performance.

faq.question: Is your service accessible from both Accra and Tema?
faq.answer: Yes, our Spintex corridor location is convenient from both Accra and Tema. We're easy to reach via the Spintex road and can also meet at your location or conduct consultations online if that works better for you.

faq.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the migration?
faq.answer: We stand behind our work with a money-back satisfaction guarantee. If the migrated EA doesn't meet the agreed specifications or doesn't achieve 98%+ signal accuracy, we'll make it right or refund your payment. Your satisfaction is our priority.

faq.question: Do I need technical knowledge to use the migrated EA?
faq.answer: No technical knowledge needed! We provide clear, practical documentation and training on operating your MT5 EA. Whether you're technically inclined or prefer to focus purely on trading, we explain everything in straightforward language.

faq.question: How quickly can you complete the migration?
faq.answer: Most migrations are completed within 2-4 weeks. Simple EAs may be ready in 1-2 weeks, complex systems may take 4-6 weeks. We provide realistic timelines upfront and keep you updated on progress throughout the project.

faq.question: What support do you provide after delivery?
faq.answer: All migrations include 30 days of comprehensive support for bug fixes, adjustments, and questions. Support is accessible via phone, WhatsApp, or in-person meetings at our Spintex location. We're here to ensure your EA works perfectly.

faq.question: Can you migrate EAs from other developers?
faq.answer: Yes! We migrate EAs from any source as long as we have access to the source code (.mq4 file). If you only have the compiled .ex4 file, we can often still migrate it, though this may take additional time. Contact us for assessment.
